message: "Hi doc, it's 16:13, my glucose level just read 150 mg/dL. This is post-lunch, I've taken my metformin 30 minutes ago. I'll continue to monitor and let you know if there are any significant changes."
Hi there, it's 6:55 PM, and I just checked my glucose level. It's 145 mg/dL post-dinner. I've already taken my insulin injection. Hope all is well with you.
